Package Classes

Class AppointmentHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • Classes.AppointmentHelper
  • public class AppointmentHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is for handling the Appointment database and scheduler functionality. This class accesses the database through the database static class.
    Author:
    Dakota Ray Tominus

      • getAllAppointments

        public static java.sql.ResultSet getAllAppointments()
        This method is used to get all the appointments from the database using the provided SQL Query. Returns the result set of all appointments in the database.
        Returns:
        Result set of all of the appointments in the database.

      • getMonthsAppointments

        public static java.sql.ResultSet getMonthsAppointments()
        This method is used to get all the months appointments from the database using the provided SQL Query. Returns the result set of all the months appointments in the database.
        Returns:
        Result set of all the months appointments in the database.

      • getWeeksAppointments

        public static java.sql.ResultSet getWeeksAppointments()
        This method is used to get all the appointments within the next week from the database using the provided SQL Query. Returns the result set of all appointments within the next week in the database.
        Returns:
        Result set of all of the appointments within the next week in the database.

      • saveAppointmentData

        public static boolean saveAppointmentData​(java.lang.String id,
                                          java.lang.String title,
                                          java.lang.String description,
                                          java.lang.String location,
                                          java.lang.String contact,
                                          java.lang.String type,
                                          java.lang.String start,
                                          java.lang.String end,
                                          java.lang.String zoneOffSet,
                                          java.lang.String customerID,
                                          java.lang.String userID)
        This method is used to save the appointment data to the database, using the provided SQL Query and User provided data. Checks if the appointment exists. Will update if appointment exists, and add a new one if not. Returns true if the operation was a success.
        Parameters:
        id - The id used to check if the customer exists or not.
        title - The title of the appointment to be saved to the database.
        description - The description of the appointment to be saved to the database.
        location - The location of the appointment to be saved to the database.
        contact - The contact of the appointment to be saved to the database.
        type - The type of the appointment to be saved to the database.
        start - The start datetime of the appointment to be saved to the database.
        end - The end datetime of the appointment to be saved to the database.
        zoneOffSet - The zone offset of the user to be used when saving a datetime to the database.
        customerID - The customer ID of the appointment to be saved to the database.
        userID - The title of the appointment to be saved to the database.
        Returns:
        The boolean representation of whether or not the operation was successful.

      • generateNextAppointmentId

        public static java.lang.String generateNextAppointmentId()
        This method is used to generate the next appointment ID using the provided SQL Query. This ID is not final and may be changed at injection.
        Returns:
        The Next hypothetical string appointment ID.

      • appointmentExists

        private static boolean appointmentExists​(java.lang.String id)
        This method is used to check if the appointment exists in the database with the name and Id provided.
        Parameters:
        id - The Appointment Id to be used to check is the appointment exists.
        Returns:
        the boolean representation of whether or not the appointment exists.

      • deleteAppointment

        public static boolean deleteAppointment​(java.lang.String appointment_id)
        This method is used to delete a appointment, using the provided SQL Query. Returns a boolean representation of whether or not the deletion was successful.
        Parameters:
        appointment_id - The appointment ID of the appointment that will be deleted.
        Returns:
        The boolean representation of whether or not the appointment was deleted.

      • hasNoAppointments

        public static boolean hasNoAppointments​(java.lang.String customer_id,
                                        javafx.scene.text.Text errorText)
        This method is used to check if the selected customer has any appointments. Sets the error text to an empty string. Returns true if no appointments are found.
        Parameters:
        customer_id - The customer ID of the customer who's appointments must be checked.
        errorText - The text for the error to be placed if the customer has appointments.
        Returns:
        The boolean representation of whether or not the customer has appointments.

      • isNotDuringBusinessHours

        public static boolean isNotDuringBusinessHours​(javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> time,
                                               javafx.scene.text.Text errorText,
                                               java.lang.String type)
        This method is used to check if the provided time is within business hours. Returns true if the time is not during business hours.
        Parameters:
        time - The time combo box to be checked whether it is during business hours.
        errorText - The error text to be used to display any business hour related messages.
        type - Type of time to be checked.
        Returns:
        The boolean representation of whether or not the time is within business hours.

      • isTimeDuringScheduledAppointment

        public static boolean isTimeDuringScheduledAppointment​(java.lang.String appointmentId,
                                                       java.lang.String customerID,
                                                       java.time.LocalDate startDate,
                                                       java.time.LocalDate endDate,
                                                       javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> startTime,
                                                       javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> endTime,
                                                       javafx.scene.text.Text startError,
                                                       javafx.scene.text.Text endError,
                                                       java.lang.String typeA,
                                                       java.lang.String typeB)
        This method is used to check if the provided start or nd time falls within another scheduled appointment. Sets error messaged informing user whether or not a time is during a scheduled appointment. Returns true if the either time is during a scheduled appointment other than itself.
        Parameters:
        appointmentId - The appointment ID for the selected appointment.
        customerID - The customer of the selected appointment.
        startDate - The start date for the appointment.
        endDate - The end date for the appointment.
        startTime - The start time for the appointment.
        endTime - The end time for the appointment.
        startError - The start date time error box for start related errors.
        endError - The end date time error box for end related errors.
        typeA - The String representation of the type/column, Start.
        typeB - The String representation of the type/column, End.
        Returns:
        The boolean representation of whether or no the time is during a scheduled appointment.

      • getAppointmentCount

        private static int getAppointmentCount​(java.lang.String customerID)
        This method is used to get the count of how many appointments a customer has.
        Parameters:
        customerID - The customer Id used to check for a appointment count.
        Returns:
        The numeric representation of how many appointments the customer has.

      • getAppointmentCountByMonth

        public static int getAppointmentCountByMonth​(int month)
        This method is used to get the appointment count by month. Returns the count for how many appointments are within a given month.
        Parameters:
        month - The month to be checked.
        Returns:
        The numeric representation of how many appointment a given month has.

      • getAppointmentCountByType

        public static int getAppointmentCountByType​(java.lang.String type)
        This method is used to get the appointment count by type.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of appointment to be counted.
        Returns:
        The numeric representation of how many appointment a given type has.

      • getAllAppointmentsForContact

        This method is used to get all the appointments for a contact. Returns the result set of all the appointments for the given contact.
        Parameters:
        contactName - The name of the contact who's appointments are needed.
        Returns:
        The result set of all the appointments for the given contact.

      • getAllAppointmentsForCustomer

        This method is used to get all the appointments for a customer. Returns the result set of all the appointments for the given customer.
        Parameters:
        customer - The name of the customer who's appointments are needed.
        Returns:
        The result set of all the appointments for the given customer.
